name: The Vanished Lantern
description:
The game is made for benbonk game jam 4#.

GamePlay:

You have lantern that lights the area around you and it can shoot soul bullet. Soul bullet when hit the enemy(the enemy will stund for 5s)  if hit a fire altar it actived or deactived or if hit a fire shooter when its active it shoots a black soul fire. You have emonocial shards, if you dont have emocial shards, you vanish. If you have the lantern and the light ghost catches you or if you dont have the lantern, you will lose emonocial shards.

Plot:

You are lonely ghost. A ghost of a child that is scared of the darkness. You had a family but they died and you became a lonely ghost, because you didnt had anyone to be with you. And your job is to find your family and reunite with your family. The lantern is remain of your family. The lanter is called The Vanished Lantern. The lantern can vanish ghost. The other ghostst are hunters. The hunters will hunt you because you have emonocial shards and hunters will take them. There are two types of hunter, a light and a dark.
